summary: Adds purchasable skills books to Skyrim, available at Belethor\'s General Goods in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds purchasable skills books to Skyrim, available at Belethor\'s General Goods in Whiterun.

I created a new set of skills books, one for every skill, and made them available at Belethor\'s.

When you buy a book, simply read it and you will level up that skill.

Compatibility:
Should be compatible with all mods as this only adds new items and adds contents to Belethor\'s shop chest.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please leave them in the comments and I\'ll get back to you as soon as possible.
author: qwertyasdwek

files.name: Purchasable Skill Books - Headbombs Better Sorting Names
